The  order  of  the  High  Court  Judge 
in  contrary  to 
law  and 
is  against  the
weight of the evidence led  in  this case.
The contradiction marked V1  was  not considered  by the trial judge.
The  learned  High  Court Judge  has  misdirected  himself  by  not giving  proper
weightage to the suspicious  elements  involving the unaccounted  belatedness
The  learned trial judge had failed  to consider the dock statement.
